A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No questions were answered from episode 7. So many plot holes that i felt like i was watching the movie “Holes”. Kylo keeps the audience in suspense by reassuring Rey that he knows who her parents are\, only to reveal that they were junkyard hobos that sold her for money. Horrible movie. Luke does absolutely nothing\, its a disgrace. Worst Star Wars film of all time.
